    LuxurySparse

    This package contains

    • General Permutation Matrix,
    • Identity Matrix,

    with high performance type convertion, kron and multiplication operations.

    LuxurySparse.jl is still a part of Yao.jl (a quantum circuit simulation package). Its document is maintained here. It will be moved out of Yao.jl completely and start to accept PR soon.
